title: In Colo., Republicans Try To Capitalize On Obama's Unpopularity
teaser: In the tight Colorado Senate race, the Republican challenger, Congressman Cory Gardner, is trying to tie the incumbent to an unpopular President Obama. The Democrat Sen. Mark Udall says his opponent is an extremist.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
